mutants.code:
def reverse_list(nums):
    left = 1
    right = len(nums) - 1
    while left < right:
        (nums[left], nums[right]) = (nums[right], nums[left])
        left += 1
        right -= 1
    return nums

def reverse_list(nums):
    left = -1
    right = len(nums) - 1
    while left < right:
        (nums[left], nums[right]) = (nums[right], nums[left])
        left += 1
        right -= 1
    return nums

    while left < right:

        left += 1

def reverse_list(nums):
    left = 0

    while left < right:

    left = 0

    while left < right:

def reverse_list(nums):
    left = 0
    right = len(nums) - 1
    while left <= right:
        (nums[left], nums[right]) = (nums[right], nums[left])
        left += 1
        right -= 1
    return nums

    left = 0
    right = len(nums) - 1
    while left >= right:
        (nums[left], nums[right]) = (nums[right], nums[left])
        left += 1

def reverse_list(nums):
    left = 0
    right = len(nums) - 1
    while left != right:
        (nums[left], nums[right]) = (nums[right], nums[left])
        left += 1
